content:
Alex worked for me for approx an 8 month period, acting as our lead developer for a very significant digital transformation (one of the big four UK utility firms).
We found Alex to be extremely professional and dependable, often going the extra mile (working evenings and weekends) to get the job done.
Alex's deep experience in this area is evident both in the quality of his work, and his clear articulation of problems/challenges alongside workable solutions.
I would happily recommend Alex and would certainly use again.
